item.title: FBI announces NBA arrests in Mafia-linked gambling, sports rigging probes
item.description: Terry Rozier, a 10-year NBA veteran, joined the Miami Heat in 2024 from the Charlotte Hornets.

item.title: Trump didn't like the EU before. Now, Russia might be pushing them closer
item.description: The U.S. and EU have had tricky relations this year, with differences over support for Ukraine and trade tariffs creating tensions.

item.title: Oil jumps 5% after Trump administration sanctions big Russian oil companies
item.description: The new sanctions are related to plans for a meeting between President Donald Trump and Russian leader Vladimir Putin being dropped.

item.title: Stony silence from Moscow after Trump turns on Russia, says talks with Putin 'don't go anywhere'
item.description: There was a stony silence in Moscow a day after President Donald Trump signalled he had lost his patience with Russian President Vladimir Putin.

item.title: U.S. mulls software-linked export curbs on China: ‘Everything is on the table’
item.description: The U.S. weighed curbs on software-related exports to China, responding to Beijing's rare earth export controls, ahead of a critical round of negotiat...
